headline: How Equinix’s European AI Data Center Build‑Out At Equinix (EQIX) Has Changed Its Investment Story
summary: Recent reports highlight Equinix as a leading operator in fast‑expanding data center markets across Germany, the Netherlands, and Portugal, where major hubs like Frankfurt and Amsterdam are seeing large new capacity pipelines to support cloud and AI workloads. An upcoming Equinix earnings call in February 2026 will give investors a clearer view of how these European build-outs are feeding into the company’s overall financial trajectory and portfolio mix. headline: Is Equinix (EQIX) Offering Long Term Value After Recent Share Price Volatility
summary: If you are wondering whether Equinix is priced fairly at its recent levels, this article walks through what the current share price could mean for long term investors. The stock last closed at US$772.02, with returns of 0.3% over 7 days, 4.1% over 30 days, 1.0% year to date, 18.2% over 3 years, 25.6% over 5 years, and a 16.0% decline over 1 year.
